entry.title: Bitcoin XT 0.11A
entry.summary: The email thread discusses the controversy surrounding a proposed blocksize increase in Bitcoin, with one party arguing that more on-chain space means less demand for off-chain solutions like Lightning Network, which could create a conflict of interest for those who stand to profit from the latter. The discussion also touches on the idea of forking the Bitcoin Core project to implement the increase, with some expressing concern about the risks involved and others suggesting a test deployment first. The debate includes accusations of misrepresentation and political maneuvering, with one party urging civility and caution. The email includes links to Bitcoin XT, the proposed fork, and various articles and manifestos outlining different positions on the issue.
